about_the_game:
This is a plot-based dark fantasy RPG. You will collect raw materials for making marionettes through different choices, evoke different memories, make new marionettes or repair old one. The main action is mouse/keyboard click interaction.

*As a work before the timeline of 'Byakuya Museum', the story and worldview are independent of each other, and even if you haven't played the previous game, it won't affect the gaming experience at all.

 

*As the prologue of the trial version, the full collection process of the demo takes about 30 minutes.

+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

Basic Operations

Confirm: enter/space/left mouse button

 

Cancel: X /esc/right mouse button

 

Move: ↑↓←→

 

Fast forward conversation: Ctrl/Alt

+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

Precautions

* Interpretation freedom: The game contains all the necessary basic information for the current version of the story. All interpretations and discussions of the plot and characters are the player's freedom, and each interpretation is one of the possibilities of the story, there is no unique official interpretation.

 

* The characters in the game are the Original characters of the author himself and his friends, and all characters are authorized for fan creation, cosplay, and free interpretation.

 

* The game can be live streamed and released in real-time. Welcome to post game screenshots and speculate and discuss the plot on social media platforms.

 

* The complete version is currently in production.

 

* Clicking on 'Start Game' will clear the existing progress. Please do not overwrite the first save in the game.

 

* Prohibit AI from learning/modifying/vilifying/insulting characters.

+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

Number of endings

Bad ending: 4

 

Normal ending: 2

+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

Special thanks

Original character author (as specific names have not yet appeared in the demo, the serial number will be used temporarily)

1 → Qianli

 

2 → V Dog

 

3 → One eared beast

 

4 → Dragon

 

？？？ → Can

 

Original music

Chai Jiyou

+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

Non gaming major, single player independent production. Finished it in one night.

name: Honekawa Marionette Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: micrsoft 64bit Window7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 Compliant graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: micrsoft 64bit Window7.8.10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compliant graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: At an unknown corner, a marionette broken—— That was too sad and lonely, so I picked her up from the darkness.However, the marionette was severely damaged and difficult to repair.———"Let's make a new marionette." the puppeteer smiled. ————— What kind of marionette will be made this time?
